channel.title: I can't get connection between my workstation and my VPS Windows Server. / RDP / UDP
channel.description:
Who can help me? I have alredy done everythig that was wrote on this site and Google. But I couldn't get a good result. This is my mistake when I try to conect:
[12:16:12:796] [10929:11786] [INFO][com.freerdp.client.common.cmdline] - loading channelEx cliprdr [12:16:12:796] [10929:11786] [INFO][com.freerdp.client.common.cmdline] - loading channelEx drdynvc [12:16:14:824] [10929:11786] [ERROR][com.freerdp.core] - freerdp_set_last_error ERRCONNECT_LOGON_FAILURE [0x00020014] [12:16:14:824] [10929:11786] [ERROR][com.freerdp.core.rdp] - rdp_recv_callback: CONNECTION_STATE_NLA - nla_recv_pdu() fail [12:16:14:824] [10929:11786] [ERROR][com.freerdp.core.transport] - transport_check_fds: transport->ReceiveCallback() - -1
